text: Marcus Lars Johansson (born 6 October 1990) is a Swedish professional ice hockey forward who currently plays for the Minnesota Wild of the National Hockey League (NHL). He has also played for the Washington Capitals, New Jersey Devils, Boston Bruins, Buffalo Sabres, and Seattle Kraken. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Buffalo Sabres players Category:Medalists at the 2014 Winter Olympics Category:Minnesota Wild players Category:New Jersey Devils players Category:Olympic silver medalists for Sweden Category:Seattle Kraken players Category:Swedish ice hockey left wingers Category:Washington Capitals players
title: Marcus Johansson (ice hockey, born 1990)
